amendment.description: To modify the authorization of appropriations for cost-effective codes implementation for efficiency and resilience.

action.text: Amendment SA 1525 proposed by Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 1514. (consideration: CR S1615; text: CR S1615) To modify the authorization of appropriations for cost-effective codes implementation for efficiency and resilience.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1525 proposed by Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 1514.
